name: Time Boi
description:
Controls

WASD - move

Space - jump.

Esc - pause and some kind of menu.

There are 2 versions for windows. Each of them uses different rendering paths. One has slightly better visuals other one has better fps. 

Also, play some music by your choice in background, so dancing would not look so awkward.  Also, be careful around the fan.

Also I included packaged game for linux, but haven't tested it. So let me know, if it's not working.
